meanings.definition: Temperas: a method of painting in which pigments are mixed with a water-soluble binder such as egg yolk.
meanings.sent1: The artist used temperas to create a beautiful landscape painting.
meanings.sent2: I learned about temperas in my art class last week.
meanings.sent3: The temperas spilled on the canvas, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her use of temperas on the canvas was like a symphony of colors.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant temperas brought life to the dull painting.

meanings.definition: Temperas: a plural form of tempera, referring to paintings created using this method.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed several temperas by famous artists.
meanings.sent2: I admire the delicate brushwork in these temperas.
meanings.sent3: The temperas on the wall seemed to come alive at night.
meanings.sent4: His collection of temperas was a window into his soul.
meanings.sent5: The temperas captured the essence of the countryside perfectly.
